name: ZINC CORPORATION OF AMERICA, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.

casebody.head_matter:
623 A.2d 321
ZINC CORPORATION OF AMERICA, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES.
